author: donaldp
msg: Add in ludicrously small jar with a single class in it. Need to repackage stuff over in avalonland to make this more reasonable.

author: donaldp
msg: Excalibur has been broken up into to lots of little small products - and thus we don't have to drag in all its contents - just the stuff we need.
This replaces the big jars with small ones of required components

author: conor
msg: Refactor ejbjar not to require BCEL to run.
